job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-Augmented Full-Stack Principal Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
AI-Augmented Full-Stack Principal Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on full-stack development with AI augmentation, but lacks specific details about core AI/ML tasks like model development, fine-tuning, or generative AI specific techniques. The emphasis is on building web applications and enhancing backends, with AI mentioned as an augmentation rather than the primary focus. It does not align with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer as defined in the coding book.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools' directly relates to traditional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS' describes backend development and cloud infrastructure integration, which are part of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements' is a standard software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements
